message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to own this truly unique product. Given its value and potential, I believe a starting price of $1,400,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to only pay up to $1,350,000. I hope we can reach an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position on the price. However, the value of this product is truly unique and I can't let it go for less than $1,380,000.  This is a very competitive offer considering its potential worth to you.

Alice, I've reviewed your latest offer. While I respect the value of the product, I must stick to my budget. I am willing to pay up to $1,360,000. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Let's split the difference. I'm willing to come down to $1,370,000. This is my final offer.
